subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text: From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*d-wam}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|དོམ||bear}}, {{cog|my|ဝံ}} (in {{m|my|ဝက်ဝံ||bear}}).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[bear]] {{gloss|mammal}} {{zh-mw|m:頭|隻}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} to [[scold]]
# to [[oppress]], to [[tyrannise]]
# [[mean]]; [[malicious]]; [[merciless]]
# [[loutish]]; [[oafish]]
# {{lb|zh|slang}} [[bear]]; a large, hairy man, especially homosexual one
# {{surname|lang=zh|dot=:}} [[Xiong]] (''mainland China''), [[Hsiung]] (''Taiwan''), [[Hung]] (''Hong Kong'')

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|牡%熊|おす%くま}}: a [[male]] bear
* {{ja-r|雌%熊|めす%くま}}: a [[female]] bear; a [[she-bear]]
* {{ja-r|子%熊|こ%くま}}: a bear [[cub]]
* {{ja-r|小%熊|こ%くま}}: a species of small bear
* {{ja-r|白%熊|しろ%くま}}: a [[white]] bear ([[polar bear]])
* {{ja-r|北%極%熊|ほっ%きょく%ぐま}}: a [[polar bear]]
* {{ja-r|黒%熊|くろ%くま}}: the [[Asian black bear]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|熊%笹|くま%ざさ}}: {{vern|bamboo grass}} ({{taxlink|Sasa veitchii|species|ver=190110}})
* {{ja-r|熊%葛|くま%つづら}}: {{vern|common vervain}} (''{{l|mul|Verbena officinalis}}'')
* {{ja-r|熊%手|くま%で}}: [[bamboo]] [[rake]]
* {{ja-r|熊%襲|^くま%そ}}: the [[w:Kumaso|Kumaso]] people
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} [[File:Medved_mzoo.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|熊}} (''kuma''): a brown '''[[bear]]'''.]]
{{ja-kanjitab|くま|yomi=k}} From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=くま}}. Probably cognate with {{m|ja|隈|tr=kuma||inside corner; inner bend; hollow or hole in something}}, perhaps from the way that bears often live in [[den]]s. Probably also cognate with {{cog|ko|곰||bear; hole}}.
